snippet: MATUS--Eli J.,of Lido Beach, NY passed away on July 9, 2016 at the age of 90. Born in New York City to Dr. David and Sophie Matus. Beloved husband of the late Alma Matus (nee Platt), loving father of Wayne Matus (Carla), Roger Matus (Natalie) and ...
lead_paragraph: MATUS--Eli J.,of Lido Beach, NY passed away on July 9, 2016 at the age of 90. Born in New York City to Dr. David and Sophie Matus. Beloved husband of the late Alma Matus (nee Platt), loving father of Wayne Matus (Carla), Roger Matus (Natalie) and Beth Barnett (David), cherished grandfather of six and great-grandfather of one. He was deeply loved by all who knew him and is greatly missed. Funeral services are private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MATUS, ELI J.
